long_description:
Note this node requires the CONNECTION_2000 node.

Note the P2000 nodes require a device specific driver/SDK downloaded from:
https://www.picotech.com/downloads.
short_description: The EXTRACT_TRACE_2000 node extracts scope traces from the P2000.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Select the channel to extract a trace from.

parameters.name: trig_threshold
parameters.description: The threshold to trigger the oscilloscope timing, in mV.

parameters.name: trig_direction
parameters.description: The direction (slope) to search for a trigger (1:Rising, 2:Falling).

parameters.name: x_samples
parameters.description: The number of samples in time (i.e. # of x axis pixels).

returns.description: The trace of the oscilloscope is returned.
